SectionAbout.p: I am a web developer with +4 years of experience using frontend and backend technologies. I have worked in high-growth startup companies where the challenges and the day-to-day are variable and of high learning. Also my digital business.
SectionAbout.p2: Without realizing it, the years in technology go by very quickly so it is important to keep up to date and review the constant updates.

SectionSkills.p: Throughout all these years there are many technologies that I have tried and many experiences that I have lived. But very useful to develop functional, secure and scalable software.

data.title: Profile
description: Professional with technical studies and self-taught in my free time I am a web developer with more than 4 years of experience developing applications for frontend, backend, API's and microservices.
https://www.youtube.com/c/IdatOficial
https://www.youtube.com/c/Platzi

data.title: Computing and Information
description: A very recognized private technology institution belonging to the Intercorp group.
Programming, Android, Networking, Operating Systems, English 3, Mathematics 3, Accounting and Statistics are some of the most outstanding courses.

data.title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Work as a team using the SCRUM methodology.
Backend development with Nodejs and frontend with vuejs for the 'Ticker' project.
Implement consumption of Twilio's APIs as a service for the 'Ticker' project.
Implement consumption of PAYU APIs as a microservice for the 'Ticker' project.
Backend development with laravel and vuejs for the 'Platcon' and 'Orbidata' project.
Implement consumption of Infobip APIs as a service for the 'Platcon' project.
Develop in backend with Laravel and frontend with vuejs for the 'Score Dialer' project.
Implement webRTC as a real-time communication channel for the 'Score Dialer' project.

data.title: Analyst and Web Developer
description: Take the requirements of each project manager in their areas and give functionality to the customer service system.
Develop a virtual survey system with laravel and vuejs to evaluate online customer service.

data.title: Web Developer
description: Take the requirements for updates to the administrative system on the web and mobile reservations.
Develop a CINEPLANET type COWORKING space reservation selection module for the web-based administrative system.
Develop in frontend with angularjs in the development of the project 'SUMATE AL ÉXITO' an integrated reservation system.

data.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Create automated python report scripts for satellite location statistics.

SectionPortfolio.p: These are just some of the personal and work projects that I have developed throughout my years as a professional developer.
